title: How to Make an Apple Dessert in a Crockpot

steps.headline: Make sure your crockpot is clean and ready to go.
steps.description: Make sure to have an open outlet and a place for the crockpot to sit for a few hours.

steps.headline: Coat your crockpot with cooking spray.
steps.description: This will ensure your food will not stick to the inside.

steps.headline: Place the apples in the bottom of the crockpot.
Start mixing.
steps.description: Combine bread crumbs, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, sugar, melted butter, and walnuts into a bowl. Stir with a spoon.

steps.headline: Place bread crumb mixture over the apples.
Cover.
steps.description: Then cook on LOW for 3 to 4 hours or on HIGH for 2 hours.

text: Make sure your crockpot is clean and ready to go. Make sure to have an open outlet and a place for the crockpot to sit for a few hours. Coat your crockpot with cooking spray. This will ensure your food will not stick to the inside. Place the apples in the bottom of the crockpot.  Start mixing. Combine bread crumbs, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, sugar, melted butter, and walnuts into a bowl. Stir with a spoon. Place bread crumb mixture over the apples.  Cover. Then cook on LOW for 3 to 4 hours or on HIGH for 2 hours. Finished.
